content: remaining stitches weave in ends and block to finished hat measurements skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 4 yarn 140 yds dk or light worsted / gauge on larger needles 4 = 20 sts/24 row needle sizes 5 & 7 16 circular needles and/or dpns finished hat measures circumference 14 / height 9 ribbing use smaller needles co 100 sts using the long-tail method place bor marker and join being careful not to twist stitches k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 p2 repeat to end of row repeat ribbing row in pattern until work measures 2 from cast on edge body of hat switch to larger needles 1 k2 m1bl k4 m1bl k2 p2 repeat to end of row 120 sts 2-7 k10 p2 8 cblf5 p2 k10 p2 9-14 repeat row 2 15 k10 p2 cblb5 p2 16-21 repeat row 2 22-30 repeat row 8-16 begin decrease row switch to dpns when necessary 31 ssk k6 k2tog p2 k10 p2 32 k8 p2 k10 p2 33 ssk k4 k2tog p2 k10 p2 34 k6 p2 k10 p2 35 cblf3 p2 k10 p2 36 repeat row 34 37 k6 p2 ssk k6 k2tog p2 38 k6 p2 k8 p2 39 k6 p2 ssk k4 k2tog p2 40 k6 p2 41 ssk k2 k2tog stitches weave in ends and block to finished hat measurements skalbagge cabled hat by imagine gnats page 5 yarn 160 yds dk or light worsted / gauge on larger needles 4 = 20 sts/24 row needle sizes 5 & 7 16 circular needles and/or dpns finished hat measures circumference 14 / height 10 ribbing use smaller needles co 100 sts using the long-tail method place bor marker and join being careful not to twist stitches k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 p2 repeat to end of row repeat ribbing row in pattern until work measures 2 from cast on edge body of hat switch to larger needles 1 k2 m1bl k4 m1bl k2 p2 repeat to end
